sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Comment dois-je vous appeler ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How should I address you?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Appuyez sur le bouton pour démarrer l'ordinateur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Press the button to start the computer.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 两家公司联合开发新产品。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Liǎng jiā gōngsī liánhé kāifā xīn chǎnpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les deux entreprises développent conjointement un nouveau produit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The two companies jointly develop a new product.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce système est très complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This system is very complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Faites attention à chaque détail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Pay attention to every detail.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì zhège xiàn de xiànzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le chef de ce district.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the county head of this county.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous nous entendons très bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We get along very well.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez télécharger ce logiciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please download this software.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège hétong yǒu sān xiàng tiáokuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce contrat comporte trois clauses.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This contract has three clauses.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wúfǎ xiǎngxiàng tā de shēnghuó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas imaginer sa vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I cannot imagine his life.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们需要综合考虑各种因素。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen xūyào zōnghé kǎolǜ gè zhǒng yīnsù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons prendre en compte tous les facteurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to comprehensively consider various factors.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le format de la réunion est une discussion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The format of the meeting is a discussion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì yǒu zhòngyào yìyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chose a une signification importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This matter has important significance.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons améliorer l'efficacité du travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to improve work efficiency.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ wúfǎ xíngróng wǒ de gǎnshòu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas décrire mes sentiments.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I cannot describe my feelings.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La situation actuelle est très grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The current situation is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个问题的性质很严重。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí de xìngzhì hěn yánzhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nature de ce problème est très grave.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The nature of this problem is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le quartier commercial est très animé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The commercial district is very prosperous.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài xuéshù jiè hěn yǒumíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très connu dans le monde académique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very famous in academic circles.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est ta raison d'être en retard ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is your reason for being late?
